courses.advice_detail_en: A bit chilly but good for running. Light layering works well. Light breeze with little impact on running. The surface is wet, and some sections may be slippery. courses.advice_detail_en: A bit chilly but good for running. Light layering works well. Almost no wind, good for maintaining your pace. The surface is wet, and some sections may be slippery. Slightly lower your pace and take extra care on downhills and corners. Air quality is moderate. Consider a mask if you are sensitive to fine dust. Extra cautions: Night caution. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
